name: Ancient AA
description:
Story:

    You are an ancient entity running on the ancient equivalent of two AA batteries. Your goal is to try and get out of the ruins before your energy runs out. You can collect energy batteries along the way, to replenish your lifespan.

Context:

    This was made for a small jam between TwistedLlama and I, in about 9 hours.
[I'll post a link to his game here when he releases it]


Note: This game is controller compatible (except for the main menu lol)

Controls:

      Gameplay:
       - Arrow keys, Left Stick: Move left and right
        - Space, South button (B on a nintendo controller): Jump
        - Escape key: Pause
     Menus:
        -Arrow keys, Left Stick: Move up and down
        -Space, South button: Select
    Special:
        -F11: Switch fullscreen

Credits:

    Everything was made by me except:
        - The music, by Raftronaut
        - Most of the sprites, by Kenney
